My research covers Replications, Meta-Science, and Judgment and Decision Making (e.g., Anchoring Effects).

::: {.callout-note icon="false"}
# Ongoing Projects

# Open Educational Resources

-   I have been writing a [German book on Open Science that is available online](lukasroeseler.github.io/opensciencebuch/).

-   I upload most slides and materials from my workshops, lectures, talks, and seminars to this OSF repository: [https://osf.io/at29b/](#0){.uri}
